CustomField.description: Total number of days scheduled based on assignment schedules and schedule exceptions. For example, if an assignment has a schedule of 4 hours M-W and the calculation period is an inclusive period of 2 weeks, the value would be 6 days (3 days/week * 2)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total number of days scheduled based on assignment schedules and schedule exceptions. For example, if an assignment has a schedule of 4 hours M-W and the calculation period is an inclusive period of 2 weeks, the value would be 6 days (3 days/week * 2)
CustomField.label: Scheduled Days
